arts.ttl: Bundesliga Preview | Augsburg vs Bayern Munich – both clubs look to maintain 100 percent record
arts.sum: Bayern Munich make the short journey to neighbouring Augsburg for the Bundesliga Topspiel on Saturday evening as they look to maintain their 100 percent start to the season. They come…

arts.ttl: Augsburg vs. Bayern Munich preview: The Return of an old acquaintance
arts.sum: Bavaria braces for a fascinating Bundesliga clash this weekend as Bayern Munich travel to face FC Augsburg in the highlighted top game on Saturday. Beyond the three points at stake, the spotlight once again falls on Sandro Wagner. Find out more about predicted lineups and squad news here.

arts.ttl: Harry Kane misses Bayern's final training session ahead of Augsburg clash
arts.sum: Bild reports that Harry Kane is not involved in Bayern’s final training session ahead of Saturday’s clash with Augsburg.
